          <title>
            <string language="en">Refining sugar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Raffinierung Zucker</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sucre de raffinage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Açúcar do refining</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows a laboratory process on how to produce refined sugar from sugar cane.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refining sugar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sugar cane</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt einen Laborprozeß auf, wie
man raffinierten Zucker aus Zuckerrohr produziert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre un processus de laboratoire 
sur la façon dont produire le sucre de raffinage à partir de la 
canne à sucre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra um processo do laboratório 
em como produzir o açúcar refinado do bastão de açúcar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra un processo del laboratorio 
su come produrre lo zucchero raffinato dalla canna da zucchero.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει εργαστηριακή διαδικασία 
στο πώς να παραγάγει την καθαρισμένη ζάχαρη από τον κάλαμο 
ζάχαρης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra un proceso del laboratorio 
en cómo producir el azúcar refinada del bastón de azúcar.</string>
          </description>
